ds2.3.2:8.2: nandī nandīrāgo → nandi nandirāgo (bj) | sibbinī → sibbanī (bj) | āyūhinī → āyūhanī (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | āsisanā āsisitattaṃ → āsiṃsanā āsiṃsitattaṃ (bj, sya-all); āsiṃsanā asiṃsitattaṃ (pts-vp-pli1) | pucchañjikatā → pucchañcikatā (bj); pucchikatā (si); puñcikatā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | chādanaṃ → chadanaṃ (bj); chandānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ds2.3.2:88.3: unnati unnamo → uṇṇati uṇṇāmo (sya-all); uṇṇati uṇṇamo (pts-vp-pli1)
ds2.3.2:93.2: issāyitattaṃ usūyā usūyanā usūyitattaṃ → usuyyā usuyyanā usuyitattaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); ussuyā ussuyanā ussuyitattaṃ (mr)
ds2.3.2:190.3: kāmupādānaṃ, diṭṭhupādānaṃ, sīlabbatupādānaṃ, attavādupādānaṃ → kāmūpādānaṃ diṭṭhūpādānaṃ sīlabbatūpādānaṃ attavādūpādānaṃ (bj)
ds2.3.2:264.2: akaniṭṭhe deve → akaniṭṭhadeve (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa → diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa (mr)
